message_1: A math student needs to find the inverse tangent of 0.5 using a calculator. What is the value of the angle (in degrees) he/she will obtain?
message_2:
To find the inverse tangent of 0.5 using a calculator, the student should use the arctangent function (usually denoted as atan or tan^-1). 

The inverse tangent of 0.5 is approximately 26.57 degrees.
